about.why_bogeira: My name is Irina Bogolyubova and I am a jewelry artist. My creative alias is Bogeira.
about.bogeira_info: To my mind, a jewelry art piece is a sculptural form fitted into environment of a human body. It is a story about sense, tactility and feeling. I prefer making handiwork, I love creating non-symmetric pieces. It is my understanding that a jewelry should be extremely comfortable and feel-good despite of the size. Now I work mostly in stainless steel and stoving enamel.
